contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 5, 1972 D Tyldesley Contest (Section B)
Tyldesley Contest (Section B) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Tyldesley Contest tyldesley-contest-section-b
St. Mary's School, Astley, Lancashire Prizes - 1st £20 and cup, 2nd £15 and trophy, 3rd £8 and cup. Best trombone - Bedford Church. Best Horn - Ifton. Best cornet and euphonium - Trinity Girls. 3rd annual contest promoted by Tyldesley Band. 8 bands competed.
May 20, 2015, 8:33 p.m. Oct. 1, 2016, 4:45 p.m.
1 Trinity Girls Band Jack Withington Themes from Symphony No. 5 [Beethoven]
2 Marple Band M. McClean
3 Bedford (Leigh) Band G. A. Littlewood
Unknown Result Hindley R. Peacock Little Suite for Brass [Arnold]
Unknown Result Bolton (Hoover) Band E. Foulkes
Unknown Result Ifton Colliery Band Eric Foster Rufford Abbey
Unknown Result Windsor Salford J. Clayton A Rural Suite
Unknown Result Haigh Prize Alan Mason From the New World [arr. Rimmer]
